increased immune decay rate for prior om.desc: Omicron is more infectious than wildtype; note that relative infecitousness is betta/gamma.

Omicron reduces minimum non-Omicron prior infection immunity.
Omicron reduces minimum vaccine immunity, but less so with a booster.
Immunity from prior Omicron infection decays twice as fast.
